name: Moving Day
description: Meet Nyla. A 13 year old girl who is moving house. However the old house looks to have other ideas. Now work you way though your house to try an escape.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
